description:
This is an ULTIMATE PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT course which contains powerful techniques that have been proven to transform lives around the world. Join this course and you will learn to actively steer your life in the direction you want it to go.

  • Are you unhappy with your life?
  • Would you like to be more successful in business or relationships?

Not everyone is happy and successful. In this comprehensive course I'll reveal to you the secrets to improving your life - no matter what you want!

Everything is included in this course for you to fully absorb yourself in personal transformation. The course comes complete with life changing techniques included exercises & worksheets to make it easy for you to get actively involved.

You will also receive FREE BONUSES worth over $100! (See below for more details about these bonuses).

And remember, Udemy has a 30 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, so you can always feel safe with your purchase.

*****

"Thanks Carmen for making such an wonderful course! Made a huge difference to me personally and professionally !!!" ~ Mike Hall

*****

"WOW!!

Your course is really worth taking. Short lectures make it very very effective and detailed explanation of the strategies are just amazing. Thanks a lot for the course" ~ Britney Slone

*****

"Clear thoughts and instructions backed up with exercises and worksheets. Covers all spheres from the root to the tip of self development." ~ Sundar

*****

If you can think of 3 things you'd like to improve your life (either large or small) jump on board this course and discover the supreme benefits that personal development can offer in your life. Dive deeply into your thoughts, values, beliefs and learn how to wield them to your advantage to achieve your goals.

I'm passionate about personal development and, in fact, use PD every day in my life!

*****

"The Best Teachers Are Those Who Have Transformed Themselves.

Carmen shares her experience and insights on how to develop greater personal growth and a happier life. Her material is comprehensive and their are two ebooks which alone would make it worth paying for the course. If you are serious about living a more fulfilled life and a happier one too I'd recommend this course. Caremen's efforts have gone into the content, not fancy graphics and wiz bang features. She sticks to what she know best, helping others grow." ~ Mark Gregory

*****

With elite knowledge of personal development you are empowered to enrich your life. You will have greater confidence, resilience, higher motivation, and better personal skills to cope with changes in your life.

The juicy goodness I love about being a personal development coach and teacher is watching a client experience a “light bulb" affect – when you go “AHA!" and get this warm buzzy feeling that you CAN and WILL improve your life.

In the course you will learn:

  • Thought Awareness
  • Positive Thinking
  • How to Change Sabotaging CORE Beliefs
  • How to Increase Your Confidence,
  • Boost Your Motivation,
  • Time Management,
  • Stress Management,
  • Goal Setting,
  • How to Activate Positivity for Better Living
  • and so much more!

With nearly 30 lectures and over 10 Personal Development Worksheets to download you'll feel fully empowered to positively change your life.

VALUABLE BONUSES!! I've also included a myriad of personal development books with this course to help give you even more insight.

  • Reinventing Yourself - 54 pages, normally $37.
  • Eliminate Stress & Anxiety - 61 pages, normally $21.
  • Better Choice, Better Live - 155 pages, normally $37!
  • Balance Your Life - 51 pages, normally $9.95 .
  • The Ultimate Personal Development Workbook by Carmen Wyld, 198 pages, normally $14.95.

If you've always wanted to improve your life but wasn't sure where to begin this course is exactly what you need!

ENROL TODAY!
title: Personal Development - Ultimate SECRETS to an Amazing Life!
